00109 
00110 // Log entry class
00111 #define ERROR_LOG       0x10
00112 #define WARNING_LOG     0x20
00113 #define EVENT_LOG       0x30
00114 #define INFO_LOG        0x40
00115 #define DEBUG_LOG       0x50
00116 
00117 #define LOG_TYPES       5
00118 
00119 #ifdef _NO_LOGGING
00120  
00121 #define LOG_BEGIN(x)    
00122 #define LOG(x)          
00123 #define LOG_END         
00124 
00125 #else
00126 
00127 #define LOG_BEGIN(x)                                            \
00128 {                                                               \
00129         if (DefaultLog::log()->log_needed(x))                   \
00130         {                                                       \
00131                 DefaultLog::log()->lock();                      \
00132                 DefaultLog::create_log_entry(x);        
00133 
00134 #define LOG(x)          *DefaultLog::log_entry() += x
00135 
00136 #define LOG_END                                                 \
00137                 *DefaultLog::log() += DefaultLog::log_entry();  \
00138                 DefaultLog::delete_log_entry();                 \
00139                 DefaultLog::log()->unlock();                    \
00140         }                                                       \
00141 }
00142 
00143 #endif
00144 
00145 
00146 /*--------------------------- class LogEntry --------------------------*/
00147 
00161 class AGENTPP_DECL LogEntry {
00162 public:
00171         LogEntry(unsigned char t) : type(t), count(0) {}
00172 
00176         virtual ~LogEntry() {}
00177 
00181         virtual void init(void);
00182 
00188         virtual LogEntry& operator+=(const long);
00189 
00195         virtual LogEntry& operator+=(const char*);
00196 
00202         virtual const char* get_value(void) const { return ""; }
00203 
00209         unsigned char get_class(void) const { return type & 0xF0; }
00210 
00216         unsigned char get_level(void) const { return type & 0x0F; }
00217 
00218 protected:
00226         virtual boolean add_string(const char*) = 0;
00227 
00235         virtual boolean add_integer(long);
00236 
00240         virtual boolean add_timestamp(void);
00241 
00242 protected:
00243         unsigned char   type;
00244         int             count;
00245 };

00248 /*------------------------- class LogEntryImpl ------------------------*/
00249 
00258 #define MAX_LOG_SIZE    255
00259 
00260 class AGENTPP_DECL LogEntryImpl : public LogEntry {
00261 public:
00270         LogEntryImpl(unsigned char);
00271 
00275         ~LogEntryImpl();
00276 
00282         virtual const char* get_value(void) const { return value; }
00283 
00284 protected:
00290         int             bytes_left() 
00291             { return (int)(MAX_LOG_SIZE-(ptr-value)-1); }
00292 
00300         boolean         add_string(const char*);
00301 
00302 private:
00303         char*           value;
00304         char*           ptr;
00305         boolean         output_stopped;
00306 };

00309 /*--------------------------- class AgentLog --------------------------*/
00310 
00322 class AGENTPP_DECL AgentLog {
00323 public:
00327         AgentLog();
00328 
00332         virtual ~AgentLog() {}
00333 
00337         virtual void    lock() {}
00338 
00342         virtual void    unlock() {}
00343 
00351         virtual void    set_filter(int logclass, unsigned char filter);
00352 
00358         virtual unsigned char get_filter(int logclass) const; 
00359 
00366         virtual LogEntry* create_log_entry(unsigned char) const = 0;
00367 
00374         virtual AgentLog& operator+=(const LogEntry*) = 0;
00375 
00387         virtual boolean log_needed(unsigned char t) 
00388           { return ((t & 0x0F) <= logfilter[(t / 16) - 1]); }
00389 
00401         virtual const char*     now(char* = 0);
00402 
00412         static const char*      get_current_time();
00413 
00414 protected:
00415         unsigned char           logfilter[LOG_TYPES];
00416         char                    static_buf[18];
00417 };

00420 /*------------------------- class AgentLogImpl ------------------------*/
00421 
00431 class AGENTPP_DECL AgentLogImpl : public AgentLog {
00432 public:
00439         AgentLogImpl(FILE* = stdout);
00440 
00447         AgentLogImpl(const char*);
00448 
00452         ~AgentLogImpl();
00453 
00459         void            set_dest(const char*);
00460 
00466         void            set_dest(FILE*);
00467 
00471         void lock()
00472         {
00473 #ifdef _THREADS
00474                 logLock.start_synch();
00475 #endif
00476         }
00477 
00481          void unlock()
00482         {
00483 #ifdef _THREADS
00484                 logLock.end_synch();
00485 #endif
00486         }
00487 
00494         virtual LogEntry* create_log_entry(unsigned char) const;
00495 
00502         virtual AgentLog& operator+=(const LogEntry*);
00503 
00504 protected:
00505         ThreadManager           logLock;
00506         FILE*                   logfile;
00507         boolean                 close_needed;
00508 };

00510 
00511 /*--------------------------- class DefaultLog --------------------------*/
00512 
00521 class AGENTPP_DECL DefaultLog {
00522 public:
00523         DefaultLog() { }
00524         ~DefaultLog() { }
00525 
00533         static void init(AgentLog* logger) 
00534           { if (instance) delete instance; instance = logger; }
00535 
00542         static AgentLog* log() 
00543           { if (!instance) init(new AgentLogImpl()); return instance; }
00544 
00551         static void create_log_entry(unsigned char t)
00552           { if (!entry) { entry = log()->create_log_entry(t); entry->init();} }
00553 
00561         static LogEntry* log_entry() 
00562           { if (!entry) create_log_entry(ERROR_LOG | 1); return entry; } 
00563 
00567         static void delete_log_entry() 
00568           { if (entry) delete entry; entry = 0; }
00569 
00570 protected:
00571 
00572         static AgentLog* instance;
00573         static LogEntry* entry;
00574 };
